alt: Plants vs Brainrots - Live Stock Tracker
title: Plants vs Brainrots - Live Stock Tracker
subtitle: Live Stock Tracker for Plants vs Brainrots
description: This is a web application that displays live in-game information for 'Plants vs Brainrots,' including the current weather and items available in the Seed and Gear shops. The UI is designed to be clean, modern, and responsive.
features: Live Weather: Shows the current in-game weather status.
Live Shop Stock: Displays the current items and quantities in the Seed and Gear shops.
Countdown Timer: Indicates when the next shop stock rotation will occur.
Modern UI: A sleek, responsive user interface inspired by modern web design.
Light/Dark Theme: Switch between light and dark modes to suit your preference.
Auto-Refreshes: The data automatically updates at regular intervals.

title: Vyla Games
subtitle: Unblocked Gaming Platform
description: A sleek and modern unblocked games website featuring a vast collection of popular titles, a clean user interface, and customizable themes.
features: Vast library of unblocked games.
Sleek, modern, and responsive user interface.
Instant search functionality to quickly find games.
Light and dark theme modes for user preference.
Proxy mode to bypass network restrictions.

title: P2P Communicator
subtitle: Real-Time Peer-to-Peer Messaging App
description: A browser-based peer-to-peer communication tool enabling direct, secure, and serverless messaging between users using WebRTC technology.
features: Serverless P2P connection using WebRTC.
Instant real-time messaging between peers.
Simple, modern, and responsive interface.
Automatic peer connection generation via unique IDs.
Open-source and privacy-focused design.

title: Youtube Video Scraper
subtitle: YouTube Video Info & Download API
description: A simple Flask API to fetch YouTube video information and provide downloadable links for specific video qualities.
features: Fully automatic video downloading.
Fetches video title, thumbnail, and available video-only formats.
Downloads videos in selected resolutions (MP4 format).
Handles merging of video and audio streams automatically.
Returns JSON responses for easy integration.

title: PWA-Generator
subtitle: Instant PWA Creator
description: A tool that generates an installable Progressive Web App from any website URL. It automatically creates an icon and allows full customization of names, colors, and display modes.
features: Automatic icon generation (no uploads).
Live icon color customization.
Short, permanent, and shareable PWA links.
Creates a true "app" experience, not a shortcut.

title: Cyron
subtitle: Discover visuals, instantly.
description: Cyron is a sleek, privacy-respecting image search engine that delivers stunning visuals, instantly. It leverages a network of public SearX instances to fetch image results without tracking the user, wrapped in a modern, dynamic user interface.
features: Privacy-Focused Backend: Aggregates results from multiple SearX instances, ensuring user privacy and anonymity.
Modern UI: A clean, glassmorphism-inspired design with light and dark themes.
Advanced Search Filters: Filter results by image size, time range, and a toggle for Safe Search.

title: Dev Tools Inspector
subtitle: Bookmarklet Dev Toolkit
description: A powerful, lightweight developer toolkit that runs as a bookmarklet on any webpage. Perfect for mobile debugging and situations where traditional dev tools are unavailable.
features: Live Console & JS Execution.
DOM & CSS Rule Inspector.
Network & Application Loggers.
Fully draggable and resizable panel.

title: Vyla
subtitle: Ad-Free Movie & Show Streaming
description: A fast, clean way to stream free movies and shows from multiple sources in one place. The site itself has zero ads, pop-ups, or trackers.
features: Netflix-Style UI with full-screen overlays.
Massive source pool for reliable streaming.
No sign-up required for instant watching.
Full PWA support for a native app experience.

title: Ovala
subtitle: Sophisticated Web Proxy
description: A sophisticated web proxy that allows users to bypass internet censorship and access blocked content freely. Built on the powerful Node Unblocker engine.

title: Vexa-AI
subtitle: Interactive AI Chatbot
description: A sophisticated AI chatbot designed for real-time interaction and task assistance. It offers smart, personalized conversations and is constantly learning to improve user service.

title: Rylox
subtitle: SoundCloud Downloader
description: A streamlined web app that lets you download SoundCloud audio tracks as MP3 files. Choose your preferred quality and save tracks directly to your device with ease.

title: Soluna
subtitle: Keyless Script Hub
description: A central hub for over 20+ keyless scripts, providing easy access and a streamlined experience for users looking for various script utilities.

title: Monitor Uptime
subtitle: GitHub Actions Utility
description: An open-source uptime monitoring and status page project powered by GitHub Actions. It's an efficient way to track the availability of your services without external dependencies.
